summary: Public Site UI Redesign - All 9 Features Verified. Native mobile app-style design now live with edge-to-edge hero, squircle quick access icons, compact header, and tighter spacing. No JS errors, navigation working correctly.

minor.issue: Console warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop in Unatienda component - minor React warning, non-breaking

passed_tests: Public landing page loads at / without errors
Header renders with compact h-12 height class
ChiPi Link logo visible in header with gradient colors
Hero section renders edge-to-edge with gradient background (red to blue)
Hero section shows 'Welcome to ChiPi Link' with subtitle
Quick access grid shows all 6 module buttons with colorful squircle icons
Module status badges display correctly (Live Beta, Coming Soon)
PinPanClub Activity section renders below quick access
Bottom navigation shows on mobile (Home, Store, Cart, Login)
Admin dashboard loads correctly at /admin after login
Admin sidebar shows all sections (Dashboard, Unatienda, Orders, etc.)
Activity Summary shows system status OK
critical_code_review_comments: SuperAppLanding.jsx implements clean native mobile app design patterns
QuickAccessButton uses gradient backgrounds for distinct module colors
SectionHeader simplified with sticky positioning and no icon background
Header.jsx has compact h-12 height as requested
BottomNav.jsx has tighter h-14 layout with safe-area support
No heavy borders or generic card grids - list-style cards used for news/events

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are live and functional

context_for_next_testing_agent: Public site UI redesign complete. Key visual changes: 1) Edge-to-edge hero with gradient (no rounded corners), 2) Squircle icon buttons with vibrant color gradients per module, 3) Compact h-12 header, 4) List-style news/event cards without heavy borders, 5) Tighter spacing throughout. Navigation works correctly. Admin dashboard accessible with auth token. Mobile bottom nav visible with 4 items.

hero_section.text_overlay: Welcome to ChiPi Link / Your Chinese community in Panama, connected
